properties.name: Woodland Manor
properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London.
properties.longDescription: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior. The rear garden is mainly laid to lawn with mature shrub borders and a paved patio area, perfect for family gatherings. Off-street parking available for two vehicles. Close to outstanding primary schools and excellent transport links make this an ideal family home.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.name: The Garden Residences
properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
properties.longDescription: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms. This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee. Located in a sought-after residential area with excellent transport connections and local amenities within walking distance.

properties.name: Heritage House
properties.description: Charming two bedroom Victorian terrace in the heart of Bromley town centre.
properties.longDescription: Charming two bedroom Victorian terrace in the heart of Bromley town centre. This beautifully maintained property features original period features including sash windows, ornate cornicing, and feature fireplaces. The ground floor offers a spacious reception room with bay window, and a modern kitchen/dining room with access to a delightful rear garden. Upstairs, two generous double bedrooms and a contemporary family bathroom. The property benefits from gas central heating, double glazing, and a recently refurbished interior. Located just moments from Bromley South station with direct trains to London Victoria and within walking distance of The Glades shopping centre, restaurants, and leisure facilities.

properties.name: Regent Park Townhouse
properties.description: Stunning five bedroom Georgian townhouse in prestigious London location.
properties.longDescription: Stunning five bedroom Georgian townhouse in prestigious London location. This magnificent property spans four floors and offers luxurious living in the heart of the capital. The ground floor features an elegant entrance hall, formal reception room, and a state-of-the-art kitchen/breakfast room with bi-fold doors to a landscaped garden. The first floor boasts a grand drawing room with period features and original fireplaces. Five spacious bedrooms are arranged over the upper floors, including a master suite with dressing room and en-suite bathroom. Additional features include a guest cloakroom, utility room, wine cellar, and off-street parking. Located moments from Regent's Park, world-class shopping on Oxford Street, and excellent transport links including multiple Underground stations.

properties.name: SkyLine Apartment
properties.description: Modern one bedroom apartment perfect for first-time buyers or investors.
properties.longDescription: Modern one bedroom apartment perfect for first-time buyers or investors. This well-presented flat is located on the second floor of a purpose-built development with lift access. The accommodation comprises an open-plan living room/kitchen with integrated appliances and breakfast bar, one double bedroom with fitted wardrobes, and a contemporary bathroom with shower over bath. The property benefits from double glazing, electric heating, secure entry system, and allocated parking. The development includes communal gardens and is ideally situated close to East Croydon station with fast trains to London Bridge and Victoria, making it perfect for commuters. Local shops, restaurants, and amenities are all within easy reach.

properties.name: Bechenham Estate
properties.description: Impressive four bedroom detached family home in sought-after Beckenham.
properties.longDescription: Impressive four bedroom detached family home in sought-after Beckenham. This substantial property offers versatile family accommodation arranged over three floors. The ground floor features a spacious entrance hall, elegant living room with feature fireplace, separate dining room, modern fitted kitchen/breakfast room, and a useful utility room and cloakroom. The first floor provides three double bedrooms and a luxury family bathroom, while the second floor offers a magnificent master suite with dressing area and en-suite shower room. The property boasts a beautifully landscaped rear garden measuring approximately 80ft, with paved patio, lawn, and mature borders. Additional benefits include a detached double garage, off-street parking for multiple vehicles, gas central heating, and double glazing throughout. Excellent local schools and Beckenham Junction station nearby.

properties.name: The Croydon Duplex
properties.description: Spacious three bedroom duplex apartment with private garden and parking.
properties.longDescription: Spacious three bedroom duplex apartment with private garden and parking. This exceptional property offers the space and flexibility of a house with the convenience of an apartment. Arranged over two floors, the ground floor comprises a large open-plan kitchen/living/dining room with bi-fold doors opening onto a private south-facing garden, a guest bedroom, and a shower room. The first floor features two further double bedrooms, including a master with en-suite bathroom, and a family bathroom. The property has been finished to an exacting standard with high-quality fixtures and fittings throughout, including engineered oak flooring, underfloor heating, and a video entry system. Two allocated parking spaces are included. Located in a popular residential area with excellent schools, parks, and transport links including East Croydon station.
